page.title: 09CHILDRENS CLUBS-OUTWOOD AREA
page.content: THE BOY SCOUT AND GIRL GUIDE MOVEMENTS ARE STRONG IN THIS AREA WITH GROUPS ATTACHED TO PARKSIDE METHODIST,OUTWOOD C.E. AND ST.JOHN'S C.E. CHURCHES.EACH GROUP INCLUDES SCOUTS,GUIDES,BROWNIES AND CUB SCOUTS.FOR THOSE AGED 15-PLUS THERE ARE VENTURE SCOUTS AND RANGER GUIDES.AT ST. JOHN'S THERE IS ALSO A "BEAVER COLONY" FOR BOYS TOO YOUNG TO JOIN CUBS SCOUTS. SOME CHILDREN ARE MEMBERS OF THE BOYS'AND GIRLS' BRIGADES AT LOFTHOUSE AND WRENTHORPE METHODIST CHURCHES. ALL THESE CHURCHES HAVE SUNDAY SCHOOLS.STANLEY GYMNASTIC CLUB, ST. JOHN'S KARATE CLUB, STANLEY RANGERS (RUGBY LEAGUE) AND STANLEY HARRIERS CATER FOR CHILDREN WHO ARE INTERESTED IN SPORTS OR ATHLETICS.
